title: Lawful Wife
description: Sabrina and Daniel’s road to happiness has been long and sensual, but littered with many obstacles. At last they’ve reached the final stepping stone: Sabrina and Daniel are getting married!A sandy beach in the Hamptons is the idyllic, romantic location to say their I Do’s . . . but when a newspaper article exposes Sabrina as an escort, their perfect wedding and happy future are suddenly threatened.NOTE: Beguiling was previously published under the title Lawful Wife.Teasing, Enticing, and Beguiling form the trilogy chronicling Daniel and Sabrina's love story.The Hamptons Bachelor Club:TeasingEnticingBeguilingScorchingAlluringSizzling
author: Tina Folsom
